name: Studio Fix Fluid SPF 15 24 HR Matte Foundation + Oil Control
about: What it is:\ An MAC Cosmetics\ original matte foundation that\s been remastered with a soft-matte finish, 87 percent skincare ingredients, and an easy-to-apply pump—now in a wide range of shades...Coverage:\ Full.Finish:\ Matte.Formulation:\ Liquid..SPF:\ 15.What Else You Need to Know: The new, good-for-skin formula is infused with 87 percent skincare ingredients, including sugar kelp extract to control oil along with red algae extract and hyaluronic acid to hydrate skin over time. New Pro Fluid Technology\ moves with skin for a natural look and comfortable, lightweight wear...Clinical Results: Consumer testing on 167 women after using product for one week:.- 98% said it blended easily onto skin.- 94% said it was color-true.- 91% said it left skin looking natural
ingredients: WaterAquaEau, Methyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Isododecane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Polyethylene, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Titanium Dioxide, Algae Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caffeine, Lecithin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Silica, Xanthan Gum, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Dimethicone/Peg-10/15 Crosspolymer, Methoxy Amodimethicone/Silsesquioxane Copolymer, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Laureth-7, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Propylene Carbonate, Alumina, Dipropylene Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Bht, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbic Acid, Chloroxylenol,  [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Create a petal-smooth, even canvas for color by prepping skin with Hyper Real Serumizer\ Skin Balancing Hydration Serum or Hyper Real SkinCanvas Balm\ Moisturizing Cream (sold separately)..-First, apply to the center of your face—or areas you desire more coverage—using a 170S Brush (sold separately); then blend out using a tapping and swirling motion for a natural, photo-ready finish..-Set makeup all day with Studio Fix Pro Set + Blur Weightless Loose Powder (sold separately) to diffuse, smooth and add dimension to your look..-Pro tip: Mix with Fix+ to sheer out your coverage or with Strobe Cream to create a luminous finish (both sold separately)..-This product is recyclable.

reviews.review_title: Perfect coverage with an awesome finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my most favourite foundations based on the coverage and finish that it provides. It\s the perfect shade for my skin tone and it\s super easy to apply using a blender sponge or even a foundation brush. Has a nice light scent that disappears after a few seconds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin in the Canadian winters and this foundation did not exacerbate the problem. It went on smooth and blends well. I reach for it on days I want more coverage.
